entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
